name: Surging Tides
description: Innate: All allied champions touched by any of Nami's abilities gain  45 (+ 20% AP) bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, 「 doubled 」「 increased to 90 (+ 40% AP) 」 when touched by  Tidal Wave.
descriptions: Innate: All allied champions touched by any of Nami's abilities gain  45 (+ 20% AP) bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, 「 doubled 」「 increased to 90 (+ 40% AP) 」 when touched by  Tidal Wave.

name: Aqua Prison
description: Active: Nami sends a bubble towards the target area that lands after 1 second, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit,  revealing them, and  suspending them for 1.5 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Nami sends a bubble towards the target area that lands after 1 second, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit,  revealing them, and  suspending them for 1.5 seconds.

name: Ebb and Flow
description: Active: Nami unleashes a stream of water onto the target  champion or herself, which then bounces to nearby unaffected champions up to twice, alternating between enemies and allies and herself.
descriptions: Active: Nami unleashes a stream of water onto the target  champion or herself, which then bounces to nearby unaffected champions up to twice, alternating between enemies and allies and herself.
Ebb and Flow  heals allies and deals magic damage to enemies, with each bounce increasing in effectiveness by ((7.5 per 100 AP) - 15)%.

name: Tidecaller's Blessing
description: Active: Nami blesses the target allied champion or herself for 6 seconds, causing the target's next three basic attacks or abilities to each deal bonus magic damage and  slow their target for 1 second.
leveling:

levelings:

Slow:15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35% (+ 5% per 100 AP)
descriptions: Active: Nami blesses the target allied champion or herself for 6 seconds, causing the target's next three basic attacks or abilities to each deal bonus magic damage and  slow their target for 1 second.
Empowered abilities that apply  area damage only deal 33% − 66% (based on level) of the bonus damage to non-champions.

name: Tidal Wave
description: Active: Nami summons a tidal wave that surges forth in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit,  knocking them up for 0.5 seconds and then  slowing them for 2 −  4 (based on distance traveled) seconds.
descriptions: Active: Nami summons a tidal wave that surges forth in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit,  knocking them up for 0.5 seconds and then  slowing them for 2 −  4 (based on distance traveled) seconds.
